mapper.update: UPDATE product p INNER JOIN image i ON p.product_idx = i.product_idx SET p.product_name = #{product.product_name}, p.product_brand = COALESCE(#{product.product_brand}, p.product_brand), p.product_price = #{product.product_price}, p.product_discount_price = #{product.product_discount_price}, p.product_release_price = #{product.product_release_price}, p.product_size = COALESCE(#{product.product_size}, p.product_size), p.product_amount = #{product.product_amount}, p.product_color = COALESCE(#{product.product_color}, p.product_color), p.product_exp = #{product.product_exp}, p.product_detail_exp = #{product.product_detail_exp}, i.image_main_file = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{image.image_main_file}, ''), i.image_main_file), i.image_real_file1 = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{image.image_real_file1}, ''), i.image_real_file1) WHERE p.product_idx = #{product.product_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_idx , p.product_brand , p.product_name , p.product_price , p.product_release_price , p.product_discount_price , p.product_date , p.product_amount , p.product_color , i.image_main_file FROM product AS p JOIN image AS i ON p.product_idx = i.product_idx ORDER BY p.product_date DESC, p.product_idx DESC

SELECT i.image_main_file,m.member_id,p.product_price,o.order_category,o.order_progress,o.order_date,o.order_idx,o.product_idx FROM orderlist o join product p join member m join image i ON o.product_idx = p.product_idx and o.member_idx = m.member_idx and o.product_idx = i.product_idx
